mapper.select: select a2.id,a2.name,tel,undergraduate_school,uschoolname,uschoolindex,master_school,mschoolname,mschoolindex,doctor_school,dschoolname,dschoolindex,composite_index,status from (select staff.id,staff.name,tel,staff.undergraduate_school,school.name as uschoolname,school_type.undergraduate_index as uschoolindex,composite_index,`status` from staff,school,school_type where staff.undergraduate_school = school.id and school.school_type = school_type.id) as a2 left join (select staff.id,school.name as mschoolname,school_type.master_index as mschoolindex,master_school from staff,school,school_type where staff.master_school = school.id and school.school_type = school_type.id) as a1 on a2.id=a1.id left join (select staff.id,school.name as dschoolname,school_type.doctor_index as dschoolindex,doctor_school from staff,school,school_type where staff.doctor_school = school.id and school.school_type = school_type.id) as a3 on a2.id = a3.id
mapper.insert: insert into staff (name, sex, tel, age, birthday, undergraduate_school, master_school, doctor_school) values(#{name},#{sex},#{tel},#{age},#{birthday},#{undergraduateSchool},#{masterSchool},#{doctorSchool})
mapper.update:
update staff set
name = #{name},
tel = #{tel},
age = #{age},
birthday = #{birthday},
undergraduate_school = #{undergraduateSchool},
master_school = #{masterSchool},
doctor_school = #{doctorSchool}
where id = #{id}
